title: Darn Tough Vermont Women's Coolmax Zuni Micro Crew Cushion Socks
features: These Darn Tough Vermont Coolmax Zuni Micro Crew Cushion Socks will carry you to the peaks and back.
Micro crew socks that sit just above the top of your hiking boot.
Mid-level cushioning provides added warmth while giving you extra cushioning on the sole so you can stay comfortable.
A performance fit that doesn't slip or bunch and that's designed to help prevent blisters.
description: These Darn Tough® Vermont Coolmax Zuni Micro Crew Cushion Socks will carry you to the peaks and back. Micro crew socks that sit just above the top of your hiking boot. Sold as one-pair pack. Mid-level cushioning provides added warmth while giving you extra cushioning on the sole so you can stay comfortable. A performance fit that doesn't slip or bunch and that's designed to help prevent blisters. Fine gauge knitting offers incredible durability while keeping a soft and almost invisible feel. Designed to pull moisture quickly away from your skin and disperse it over a greater area on your sock so that it dries more quickly. All weather performance keeps you at just the right temperature no matter what season it is. Coolmax® fabric moves moisture away from your skin and spreads it over the sock so it can evaporate more easily even in warm weather. True Seamless™ toe is fused together for an incredibly smooth feel. 58% Coolmax® polyester, 40% nylon, 2% Lycra® spandex. Machine wash, tumble dry. Made in the USA.
